  16. open Printf

  18. external isatty : out_channel -> bool = "caml_sys_isatty"
  19. external terminfo_rows: out_channel -> int = "caml_terminfo_rows"

  21. ‌type status =
  22.   | Uninitialised
  23.   | Bad_term
  24.   | Good_term

  26. ‌let setup oc =
  27.   let term = try Sys.getenv "TERM" with Not_found -> "" in
  28.   (* Same heuristics as in Misc.Color.should_enable_color *)
  29.   if term <> "" && term <> "dumb" && isatty oc
  30.   then Good_term
  31.   else Bad_term

  33. ‌let num_lines oc =
  34.   let rows = terminfo_rows oc in
  35.   if rows > 0 then rows else 24
  36.     (* 24 is a reasonable default for an ANSI-style terminal *)

  38. ‌let backup oc n =
  39.   if n >= 1 then fprintf oc "\027[%dA%!" n

  41. ‌let resume oc n =
  42.   if n >= 1 then fprintf oc "\027[%dB%!" n

  44. ‌let standout oc b =
  45.   output_string oc (if b then "\027[4m" else "\027[0m"); flush oc
